content: quote: Originally posted by ENYVTHS: I hate to say it, but what give the USA the right to say who can have missles. In spite of the fact that I don't trust (or like) Kimmie, some small part of me agrees with your position. Who's to say who can play with rockets (I believe this vehcle is a rocket, FWIW). That he does play with his big toys while his people starve and freeze says about all I need to hear about the man(?). I hate to think of it happening, but let the fool drop one on somebody and then light the place up. He's got to know something like that would happen. But its hard to punish someone before they F up.
